en.title: **Bachelor** in Computer Science
en.text:
Completed a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science at Maynooth University, with a strong foundation in:

  • Software development and algorithm design
  • Data structures, systems programming, and databases
  • Hands-on projects in web development and machine learning
  • Gained practical and theoretical skills that laid the groundwork for advanced AI research

Collaborated with peers on open-source projects and university coding clubs

en.title: AI Foundations **Nanodegree**
en.text: Completed a Nanodegree program focused on foundational concepts in Artificial Intelligence, including machine learning principles, neural networks, and real-world AI applications. Built a solid base for further exploration in deep learning and applied AI research.

en.title: AWS **DevOps**
en.text: Completed hands-on training in AWS cloud services, gaining practical experience with EC2, RDS, Lambda, EKS, S3, and Terraform to build scalable, secure, and automated cloud infrastructure.

en.title: Blockchain **Crypto Currency**
en.text: Completed a comprehensive course on blockchain technology, covering core concepts like decentralized networks, smart contracts, consensus mechanisms, and real-world applications across finance and beyond.
